components.name: Editor Core
components.description: The main component responsible for code editing, syntax highlighting, and language support.

components.name: Extension Host
components.description: A separate process that runs extensions, allowing for enhanced functionality and customization of the editor.

components.name: Debugging Interface
components.description: Handles debugging tasks, integrating with various programming languages and frameworks.

components.name: Development Container
components.description: Provides a consistent development environment using Docker containers for building and testing applications.

data_flows.description: The Editor Core sends user commands and code context to the Extension Host for processing and extension functionalities.
The Extension Host communicates with the Debugging Interface to facilitate debugging features provided by installed extensions.

trust_boundaries.name: User Environment
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user's local environment and the application components.

trust_boundaries.name: External Services
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the application and external services or APIs accessed by extensions.
